For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1781>commanded,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5091>Honor<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> mother: <S%G3384><s%> <S%G2532>and,<s%> He that <S%G2551>curseth<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> let him <S%G5053>die<s%> the death. <S%G2288><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G3004>say,<s%> Whosoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall <S%G2036>say<s%> to his <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> his <S%G3384>mother,<s%> It is a <S%G1435>gift,<s%> by whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> thou mightest be <S%G5623>profited<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> me; <S%G1700><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5091>honor<s%> <S%G3364>not<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> he shall be free. <S%G2532>Thus<s%> have ye made the commandment of God of none effect <S%G208><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1785><s%> <S%G2316><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> tradition. <S%G3862><s%>
Ye <S%G5273>hypocrites,<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> did <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> <S%G4395>prophesy<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> draweth <S%G1448>nigh<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%> with <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G4750>mouth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5091>honoreth<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> with their <S%G5491>lips;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G568>is<s%> <S%G4206>far<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> me. <S%G1700><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> in <S%G3155>vain<s%> they do <S%G4576>worship<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> for <S%G1319>doctrines<s%> the <S%G1778>commandments<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> that which <S%G1525>goeth<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G2840>defileth<s%> a <S%G444>man;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> that which <S%G1607>cometh<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4750>mouth,<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2840>defileth<s%> a man. <S%G444><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1492>Knowest<s%> thou <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> were <S%G4624>offended,<s%> after they <S%G191>heard<s%> this <S%G3056>saying?<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> <S%G5451>plant,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3770>heavenly<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> hath <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5452>planted,<s%> shall be rooted up. <S%G1610><s%>

Let them alone: <S%G863><s%> <S%G846><s%> they <S%G1526>be<s%> <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G3595>leaders<s%> of the <S%G5185>blind.<s%> <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G3594>lead<s%> the <S%G5185>blind,<s%> <S%G297>both<s%> shall <S%G4098>fall<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the ditch. <S%G999><s%>
Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G5419>Declare<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable.<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> Are <S%G2075><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G188>yet<s%> without understanding? <S%G801><s%>

Do not ye <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G3539>understand,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3956>whatsoever<s%> <S%G1531>entereth<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> at <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G5562>goeth<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2836>belly,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> is cast <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the draught? <S%G856><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> those things which <S%G1607>proceed<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> come <S%G1831>forth<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2588>heart;<s%> and <S%G2548>they<s%> <S%G2840>defile<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> man. <S%G444><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G1831>proceed<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G1261>thoughts,<s%> <S%G5408>murders,<s%> <S%G3430>adulteries,<s%> <S%G4202>fornications,<s%> <S%G2829>thefts,<s%> false <S%G5577>witness,<s%> blasphemies: <S%G988><s%>

These <S%G5023><s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> the things which <S%G2840>defile<s%> a man: <S%G444><s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> with <S%G449>unwashen<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G2840>defileth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a man. <S%G444><s%>

Then <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1564>thence,<s%> and <S%G402>departed<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3313>coasts<s%> of <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4605>Sidon.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> I am <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G622>lost<s%> <S%G4263>sheep<s%> of the <S%G3624>house<s%> of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>
Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3588>she<s%> and <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G997>help<s%> <S%G3427>me.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> It <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2570>meet<s%> to <S%G2983>take<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5043>children's<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G906>cast<s%> it to dogs. <S%G2952><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>she<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3483>Truth,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> <S%G1063>yet<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2952>dogs<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5589>crumbs<s%> which <S%G4098>fall<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G2962>masters'<s%> <S%G5132>table.<s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>her,<s%> O <S%G5599><s%> <S%G1135>woman,<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> is <S%G4675>thy<s%> faith: <S%G4102><s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> it unto <S%G4671>thee<s%> even <S%G5613>as<s%> thou wilt. <S%G2309>And<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G2364>daughter<s%> was made <S%G2390>whole<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> that <S%G1565>very<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3327>departed<s%> from <S%G1564>thence,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> nigh <S%G3844>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> and sat <S%G2521>down<s%> <S%G1563>there.<s%>

Insomuch <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G2296>wondered,<s%> when they <S%G991>saw<s%> the <S%G2974>dumb<s%> to <S%G2980>speak,<s%> the <S%G2948>maimed<s%> to be <S%G5199>whole,<s%> the <S%G5560>lame<s%> to <S%G4043>walk,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5185>blind<s%> to <S%G991>see:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G4159>Whence<s%> should <S%G2254>we<s%> have so <S%G5118>much<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2047>wilderness,<s%> <S%G5620>as<s%> to <S%G5526>fill<s%> so <S%G5118>great<s%> a <S%G3793>multitude?<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> How <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> ye? <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2033>Seven,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G3641>few<s%> little <S%G2485>fishes.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2753>commanded<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> to sit <S%G377>down<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>ground.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2486>fishes,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> gave <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> and <S%G2806>broke<s%> them, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> to <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>multitude.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they did <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5315>eat,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G5526>filled:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they took <S%G142>up<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2801>broken<s%> meat that was <S%G4052>left<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4711>baskets<s%> <S%G4134>full.<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> they that did <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> four <S%G5070>thousand<s%> <S%G435>men,<s%> <S%G5565>beside<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3813>children.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he sent <S%G630>away<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> and took <S%G1684>ship,<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G4143><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3725>coasts<s%> of <S%G3093>Magdala.<s%>
